Its all about learining , isnt it Frank?! Atleast you are wise enough to admit when youve made an error. Very outstanding! Glad that your still open to ideas and not becoming "one" of those "old school" guys that are closed minded to things. lol

Frank Sumption <franks-boxes@...> wrote:          I was watching a thing on History about the various UFO Hunters, and how 
they go about digging for the evidence, and the various "jobs" each does. It 
occured to me that I ghost hunter was exactly the same, and I should be alot 
more tolerant of theses other elevel of investigation. Anyone that has known 
me for awhile probably knows I can be dense!

Frank
